emails.subject: Fwd: Application for Internship during Summer of 2025
emails.body_text:
Respected Sir/Madam,

I would like to apply for the internship during the Summer of 2025 in the
May- June window at NRSC in ISRO. I am a curious and explorative computer
science student from PSG College of Technology. I would love to collaborate
with ISRO and the National Remote Sensing Center to be able to learn and
build innovative products and services in collaboration with industry
professionals. I believe this will be a very rare chance to learn to the
fore-front of technology.

I have experience working with Frontend, Backend and Full Stack Projects in
the Application development space and have worked on two different
Artificial Intelligence projects that use open-source LLMs and AI Agentic
workflow. I have also worked with open source models and cloud services to
build a text to video news converter which one “first prize” at the AI
Googleathon at SNS College of Engineering.

I am also certified in Python, SQL, ExpressJS, JavaScript and Version
Control System. I also have experience working with open source AI
Frameworks such as LangChain and LlamaIndex.

I am an executive at the GitHub Campus Club of PSG College of Technology
and I handle frontend development and Applied AI Applications.
More details about my profile are enclosed within my resume.

I would love to work at NRSC and ISRO and hope I will be given a chance to
do the same.

Regards,
Anandkumar NS
Ph: +91 9384870740

Regards,
Anandkumar NS
Ph: +91 9384870740
emails.body_html:
Respected Sir/Madam,

I would like to apply for the internship during the Summer of 2025 in the May- June window at NRSC in ISRO. I am a curious and explorative computer science student from PSG College of Technology. I would love to collaborate with ISRO and the National Remote Sensing Center to be able to learn and build innovative products and services in collaboration with industry professionals. I believe this will be a very rare chance to learn to the fore-front of technology.

I have experience working with Frontend, Backend and Full Stack Projects in the Application development space and have worked on two different Artificial Intelligence projects that use open-source LLMs and AI Agentic workflow. I have also worked with open source models and cloud services to build a text to video news converter which one “first prize” at the AI Googleathon at SNS College of Engineering.

I am also certified in Python, SQL, ExpressJS, JavaScript and Version Control System. I also have experience working with open source AI Frameworks such as LangChain and LlamaIndex.

I am an executive at the GitHub Campus Club of PSG College of Technology and I handle frontend development and Applied AI Applications.
More details about my profile are enclosed within my resume.

I would love to work at NRSC and ISRO and hope I will be given a chance to do the same.

Regards,
Anandkumar NS
Ph: +91 9384870740

Regards,
Anandkumar NS
Ph: +91 9384870740
